statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 53000. If she receives a raise of 3300 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-53000 = 47000. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{47000}}{{3300}}={14.242424242424} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 15 years.
